description: Buy and sell U-88 Fall Arrest
full_summary:
**U-88 Fall Arrest Project**

**Reference**: cb-4732-75048298
**Solicitation Number**: 22-58157
**Publication Date**: April 12, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: May 16, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

The National Research Council Canada is seeking a contractor for the U-88 Fall Arrest Project, which includes the installation of a fall arrest system and modifications to the structural frame and mezzanine in the Climatic Chamber at Building U88.

**Mandatory Criteria**: To bid on this project, contractors must meet the following mandatory criteria:

1. A minimum of 10 years of experience as a general contractor providing construction services comparable to this project.
2. The proposed construction site supervisor must have a minimum of 7 years of experience in contract/construction administration, as a site supervisor or similar position.
3. The proposed project manager must have a minimum of 7 years of experience in contract/construction administration, as a project manager or similar position.

**Evaluation Procedure**: The construction tender form will be evaluated and scored based on specific evaluation criteria. Contractors are required to provide a comprehensive description of their response to meet the mandatory requirements.

**Site Visit**: Contractors are required to attend a mandatory site visit on April 25th or 26th, 2023. A representative from the Constructor must attend the site visit, which may take longer than usual. Physical distancing and the use of NRC-issued disposable face coverings are mandatory.

**Security Requirement**: This procurement contains a mandatory security requirement, which includes:

1. The Contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).
2. The Contractor personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites must each hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS, granted or approved by CISD/PWGSC.
3. The Contractor must comply with the Security Requirements Checklist attached at Appendix D and the Industrial Security Manual (Latest Edition).

**Additional Requirements**: Contractors must also provide a valid WSIB (Workplace Safety and Insurance Board) certificate with their tender and follow the link: https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/esc-src/msi-ism/index-eng.html

**Contact Information**: Tania Backes, Contracting Authority, Procurement Services, can be contacted at Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca or (613) 410-3834
